djluv, you are the best. just a request to you to try CBR instead of VBR; and use "Stereo" instead of "Joint stereo".

Yes it will increase the size of the rip, but it gives exceptional quality when played in anything but computer. It has been a while that I'm recoding your rips (the best ones here) into CBR and stereo.

Those extra MB arn't going to kill ya. What say :)
yeah.. agree with ilovemedia...try CBR instead of VBR
